row.process:
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" @echo off :CASE "UNIX" :ENDSWITCH
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH !-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AGENT_DEPLOYMENT.PRV.INCLUDE.HOST_CONNECTION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service Manager Install Directory" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SM_DIRECTORY#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service Manager Phrase" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SM_PHRASE#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AGENT_DEPLOYMENT.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:DEFINE &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, string
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AGENT_DEPLOYMENT.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JAVA_ARGS :SET &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, '-wor "&UC4RB_SM_DIRECTORY#" ') :SET &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, '-phr "&UC4RB_SM_PHRASE#" ')
:SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CLASS# = "AgentDeployment InstallServiceManager" ! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_JAVATOOL_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_JAVA_CLASS# &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** INSTALL SERVICE MANAGER ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** INSTALL SERVICE MANAGER ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AGENT_DEPLOYMENT.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
